Articles.Content:
Hey, not on the first date... ah what the hell! Welcome back! \*hugs him/her of his own free will\*

You know, I DO hope we won't have to fight each other in another war once we are done with this.

- - - Updated - - -

(and the dead guy still speaks...I thought that in space, no one can hear you! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))
"Him"???? Wha-

> 
> Hey, not on the first date... ah what the hell! Welcome back! \*hugs him/her of his own free will\*
> You know, I DO hope we won't have to fight each other in another war once we are done with this.

Why not? Are you chicken or something?
Xannari, I am getting older, and, actually, if this Court martial goes through, The galaxy won't have me there to save it in the next war. In fact, the first hearing is in a few days

Mm mm.... Chicken....

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Xannari, I am getting older, and, actually, if this Court martial goes through, The galaxy won't have me there to save it in the next war. In fact, the first hearing is in a few days

Fake your death!

> 
> Xannari, I am getting older, and, actually, if this Court martial goes through, The galaxy won't have me there to save it in the next war. In fact, the first hearing is in a few days

Well I can help with that. Do you want to keep going?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Mm mm.... Chicken....

[You're making me hungry, damn it!]

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Hey, not on the first date...

Is this a date now?

For me, the military is my life! Oh I could easily make do with life as a liaison on the Citadel, but...\*shudders thinking of the past couple of years\*

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Well I can help with that. Do you want to keep going?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> [You're making me hungry, damn it!]
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Is this a date now?

lol, just an earth saying...I still haven't figured out what it means, they always seem to use this term in situations like this! \*shrugs\*
Military man, eh? I can probably do something with that. If you don't mind, of course.
This is getting awkward...
\*coks eyebrow\* (I am not military irl, just for the game)

> 
> This is getting awkward...

[Quite...]

Let's focus back on the current situation...

- - - Updated - - -

I have an idea, I'll be back...

\*rolls to the back of the ship\*

Ten minutes later, you see an empty wheelchair come into view
I'm dead

> 
> I'm dead

(you've said that at least 5 times now)

...Vincent, also see about modifying unit 2 to these configurations. I want to run some tes-

...

Umm... That's DEFINITELY not how physics works... Vincent, you take command for now. I'm gonna go check this out.
as you turn, you see me slowly limping onto the control deck.

Hey! Sampa! Are you alright? What happened back there?

...That looks like it hurts! I'll go get a few things for that.
He took experimental drugs! Wait.... That bottle had rat poison!

I'm fine, Just remnants from that encounter at the base 2 years ago. I thought that since they were looking for me directly, why not throw them off the path with my wheelchair

- - - Updated - - -

\*collapses into the nearest chair with a grunt\*

It's a scar?

...Wait, who's looking for you? Where are they!? **Draws sword, frantically looking around**Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

Why do you have a sword?

- - - Updated - - -

/tp Laythe Sampa [enter]

- - - Updated - - -

I'm baaaaack!

fist fight with...the fake you...I took a pretty bad hit to the kneecap. I believe these beings are wanting to take me out because of this article \*brings up an article showing Sampa as being the hero of the Xannarian War and that he had single-handedly ended the war.\*

What about me? What am I, chopped appendix?

- - - Updated - - -

(Goes insane and stabs Sampa with Shardblade)

Oh... I... I was responsible for that...? 

Haven't you got the necessary equipment to repair it?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> What about me? What am I, chopped appendix?
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> (Goes insane and stabs Sampa with Shardblade)

[Cool story. Let's get back to the real one]
We can amputate (holds up Shardblade)
